name: Mystic Mirage
text_description: The Mystic Mirage uses its arcane powers to misdirect its opponents. When attacked, there is a 50% chance that the attack will miss entirely.
illustration_description: An elusive figure shrouded in a swirl of mystical energies, standing within a tenebrous realm filled with floating arcane glyphs and shimmering stars. Its form is constantly shifting, thus perpetuating its illusionary facade.
